translation.en: [man 1] Dad, my interview is about to start.
-What happened to the Wi-Fi? -Try by the window.
translation.ko: - 와이파이가 왜 이러죠? - 창가에 가서 해봐

translation.en: No, he can't go over by the window. I've just set up all of this here.
translation.ko: 아냐, 창가는 안 돼 여기에 준비 다 해놨거든

translation.en: Okay. We're back. Could someone tell Kayla not to blast music while I'm doing this?
translation.ko: 연결됐어요, 케일라한테 음악 좀 줄여달라고 해주세요

translation.en: Your interview's not for 15 minutes. Go tell her yourself.
I gotta keep an eye on Mom. We're one step away from baby photos.
translation.ko: 엄마를 감시해야죠 이러다 아기 때 사진도 놓겠어요

translation.en: Oh, good. How else would anyone know what sport I play?
translation.ko: 딱이네요, 그게 있어야 내가 하키 선수인지 알겠죠?

translation.en: Kayla, turn the music down, please.
One day you're gonna be a second late, and I'm gonna worry.
translation.ko: 언젠가 네가 조금이라도 늦으면 걱정될 거야

translation.en: Anyway, I'm on Canadian time. So technically, I'm five hours early.
Ugh, even time is better back home.
You're scoring week in, week out.
Scouts flocking to your games, home and away,
translation.ko: 스카우트들이 네 시합에 몰려들어 홈 경기든 원정 경기든

translation.en: and then you move to England!
moves to England and sets up a center of excellence
that has produced no less than six international superstars.
Come on. She had no curfew back home.
translation.ko: 이러지 마, 캐나다에선 통금 시간 없었어

translation.en: All of this is new for her.
She has a curfew because this is new for her.
-Maybe she's with friends. -She doesn't have any friends yet.
translation.ko: - 친구랑 있을지도 몰라 - 아직 친구 없어

translation.en: All right, look. One problem at a time?
[journalist] Hammarström used to play with your dad, right?
I think it'd be more accurate to say that my dad played with Hammarström.
translation.ko: 더 정확히는 제 아버지가 해머스트롬 감독님 동료였죠

translation.en: Luke MacBentley did not smash any NHL records.
translation.ko: 루크 맥벤틀리는 NHL 기록을 하나도 못 깼잖아요

translation.en: So we got some more questions coming in here from Sean in Alberta.
Back home, you are known as the Mac-gician.
Do your new teammates have any nicknames for you yet?
translation.ko: 새 팀원들이 별명 지어준 거 있니?

translation.en: If she's not home by ten, I'm gonna call the police.
translation.ko: 케일라가 10시까지 안 오면 경찰에 연락할 거야

translation.en: It's not so obviously cool as Mac-gician, but--
-No, no. I'm… I'm still the-- -[phone chimes]
On a scale from one to grounded, where do you think you're at?
translation.ko: 외출 금지까지 몇 점 쌓인 거야?

translation.en: Well, they don't know I snuck into the rink, which is good.
translation.ko: 내가 아이스 링크에 몰래 들어온 줄 모르니까 괜찮아

translation.en: And I've still got the "Mac uprooted me and dragged me to England" card, so…
translation.ko: 또 '맥 때문에 억지로 잉글랜드에 왔다' 카드를 쓰면

translation.en: We need to nail those jumps if we're gonna be ready for Ice Burn.
translation.ko: 아이스번 대회 나가려면 점프를 완벽하게 만들어야지

translation.en: how are we gonna do Ice Burn?
[Jacob] Just… I love these long-distance skates.
They're… they're great. They're really fun. But I mean, we're not…
I'm still your best friend, that's not gonna change, but it's just…
translation.ko: 난 네 절친이야, 그건 안 변해 그래도…

translation.en: I don't know if this is such a good idea. I--
I just thought it wouldn't matter.
I know that sounds crazy. I just thought
translation.ko: 이상한 소린 줄은 아는데요 전 그냥…

translation.en: you can put us in Canada and England
or the moon and Timbuktu, and we'd find a way.
translation.ko: 달이나 팀북투에 데려가도 방법이 있을 줄 알았어요

translation.en: I mean, they found ice on the moon, right?
I'm getting princess emojis from people I haven't spoken to
translation.ko: 초등학교 이후로 얘기도 안 해본 애들한테

translation.en: This is your fault. You ruined my interview for Iceblast, Kayla.
translation.ko: 다 너 때문이야, 케일라 아이스블래스트 인터뷰를 망쳤어

translation.en: -You are gonna find a new partner, Kayla. -[footsteps stomping]
translation.ko: 새 파트너를 찾게 될 거야, 케일라

translation.en: Because you, you could skate with anyone.
translation.ko: 넌 누구와도 같이 탈 수 있어

translation.en: Wh… Why is Mac getting princess emojis?
and he told 900 people that his nickname was Drama Queen.
translation.ko: 900명이 보는 데서 자기 별명이 드라마 퀸이라고 했대

translation.en: Mama, if I leave the ice earlier, I can change at the rink.
translation.ko: 엄마, 연습 빨리 끝내고 링크에서 갈아입으면 되잖아요

translation.en: Ava, you need to work on your priorities.
"Mama, I need to change at the rink. Mama, I should be at school."
translation.ko: '엄마, 링크에서 갈아입을래요 엄마, 학교 가야 해요'

translation.en: Was. I haven't seen her since your dad stopped playing.
translation.ko: 그랬지 너희 아빠 은퇴한 뒤로 처음 보네

translation.en: All these hockey stars he flies in,
and he can't see the skating sensation right in front of him.
But you're gonna show him, aren't you, Ava?
[sighs] So, this is an open invitational.
Look, I know it's a bit soon,
but I just thought if you could find a partner,
obviously, you qualify for the UK team through me.
translation.ko: 엄마 국적이 영국이니까 영국 대표팀도 가능해

translation.en: This could be a chance for medals, sweetheart.
translation.ko: 메달을 딸 기회가 될 수도 있어

translation.en: You know, your first step on that path.
Mac's only been here two weeks. He's still trying to impress.
translation.ko: 맥은 2주밖에 안 됐어 열심히 하려는 거야

translation.en: Look, there's trying to impress, and then there's just showing off.
translation.ko: 열심히 하는 거랑 잘난 척하는 건 엄연히 달라

translation.en: Four players surrounding him, and he still did not pass.
And he got around them and scored.
Your brother isn't the one always shouting for a puck that never comes, is he?
translation.ko: 네 동생은 오지도 않을 퍽 달라고 소리치진 않지

translation.en: Just… Just one teeny, little prank.
Easy, man. You'll put a hole in the net. And my brother.
translation.ko: 살살해, 골망에 구멍 내겠어 내 동생한테도 그렇고

translation.en: [Bear] Training's done. Let's get a drink.
If I'm at my best, then you guys are at yours, okay? So…
translation.ko: 난 나대로, 너흰 너희대로 최선을 다하면 돼

translation.en: No need to be a drama queen.
-Do you ever skate? -No, I just work here.
translation.ko: 스케이트 타? 아니, 그냥 여기서 일해

translation.en: You sure, or just pretend to for free food?
translation.ko: 정말? 아니면 공짜 밥 때문에 그런 척하는 거야?

translation.en: Mum runs the cafe. She likes to keep an eye on me.
translation.ko: 엄마가 카페를 하셔 날 감시하고 싶어 하거든

translation.en: I can't answer that, Sky, because I'm not eavesdropping.
translation.ko: 대답 못 하겠다, 스카이 엿듣고 있질 않아서

translation.en: -Are you some kind of master criminal? -Something like that.
Mac. Yeah, yeah. I won the hockey scholarship.
I don't know if you realized I was the one banging in all the goals.
translation.ko: 봤는지 모르겠는데 방금 연속으로 골 넣은 게 나야

translation.en: You know, I, uh, got a nice smile, so…
gotta make sure I keep all my teeth.
Oh, just 'cause I thought it would have to be
Besides, look, I gotta go get changed,
I'll try not to let my massive ego hit the door on the way out.
translation.ko: 내 엄청난 부심이 사라지지 않도록 할게

translation.en: Oh, I feel bad. It's like being mean to a puppy.
translation.ko: 강아지한테 못되게 군 것 같아서 미안하네

translation.en: The only thing Mac and a puppy have in common is needing to be trained.
translation.ko: 맥과 강아지의 공통점은 훈련이 필요하다는 것뿐이야

translation.en: They might look cute, but give 'em an inch,
and they'll drag your family to a continent where you can't skate.
translation.ko: 스케이트도 탈 수 없는 대륙으로 온 가족을 끌고 와

translation.en: If only we had a rink.
-Can you find a partner here? -You sound like my mom.
translation.ko: - 여기서 파트너 찾을 수 있어? - 우리 엄마처럼 얘기하네

translation.en: Just, it's never been about that.
Just skating so in sync that you're, like, connected or something.
translation.ko: 한 몸처럼 스케이트를 타다 보면 교감이 되는 느낌이랄까

translation.en: I don't know. It's like speaking a new language.
translation.ko: 그게, 새로운 언어를 말하는 것 같거든

translation.en: Sounds very special. I guess that doesn't come along every day.
translation.ko: 아주 특별한 거네 쉽게 찾아오지 않는 기회겠어

translation.en: -[ringing] -Pick up, pick up, pick up, pick up.
You can do a double axel?
Sweetheart, I can hear you thinking from here.
And make sure you bring your skates to the rink today.
translation.ko: 오늘은 아이스 링크에 스케이트 꼭 가져가

translation.en: We sort of maybe asked someone to audition to be your new partner.
translation.ko: 네 새 파트너 오디션을 부탁해 놨거든

translation.en: He is great. He's called Archie. He's 15, and trust me.
-This is terrible. -He's, like, half her height.
translation.ko: 최악이네 키가 케일라 반밖에 안 돼

translation.en: [mom] Well, that is an exaggeration. Maybe three quarters.
Ah, I've been to America before.
So, um, you've been looking for a partner long?
I… I would help you up, but this tends to be where I drop people.
translation.ko: 일으켜 줄게 내가 이런 식으로 놓쳐

translation.en: Can we please just be honest and acknowledge how bad that was?
translation.ko: 얼마나 끔찍했는지 그냥 얘기하면 안 될까요?

translation.en: -Good. I'm so glad you said. -I'm so sorry, love. It's my fault.
Yeah. I mean, I thought you were bringing him down, really.
translation.ko: 그래, 네가 걔를 넘어뜨리는 줄 알았어

translation.en: Well, Anton's back today, so it'd be good to stay and support Mac.
translation.ko: 앤턴이 오늘 돌아오니까 남아서 맥을 도와주는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: He watched you, right? So it'd be nice.
translation.ko: 맥은 네가 하는 걸 봤잖아 너도 그래야지

translation.en: Hammarström can cut me loose at any time. I gotta hit the ground running.
translation.ko: 감독님한테 언제든 잘릴 수 있어요, 열심히 해야죠

translation.en: Can I get you a milkshake?
Are you okay? Have you got a fever? Headache?
You know what the doctor said.
You're not out of the woods yet. You have to be so careful.
translation.ko: 아직 다 나은 게 아니라고 조심해야 해

translation.en: Okay, now I have a headache.
Okay, Hammers. Let's go! Go! Go!
Mac, let's show Anton exactly why you're here.
translation.ko: 맥, 앤턴에게 여기 왜 왔는지 보여줘

translation.en: I need a captain's performance from you today, all right? Captain's. Go.
translation.ko: 주장답게 실력을 보여줘 주장답게, 가 봐!

translation.en: Tonight is the first time Hammarström has seen the new team.
translation.ko: 오늘은 해머스트롬 감독님이 새 팀을 처음 보는 날이야

translation.en: We're in this together. So I need you to play together.
translation.ko: 우린 한 팀이야 협력하는 모습을 보여줘

translation.en: -Remember all your goals for the Cyclones? -Yes, coach.
translation.ko: - 사이클론스에서 넣은 골 기억해? - 네, 감독님

translation.en: tonight is the first time you pulled on skates.
-You show me what you got. -Yes, coach.
Come. I need a word with my new assistant coach.
translation.ko: 자, 난 새 코치와 얘기 좀 해야겠다

translation.en: -Oh, hey, buddy. What's up? -[mom] Hi, Anton.
Sorry I wasn't here when you arrived.
I had a Legends tour in Russia, then a book launch in Sweden.
translation.ko: 러시아 레전드 투어 후에 스웨덴에서 책 출간 행사를 했어

translation.en: -Still, great to be back on the ice again. -Yeah, nothing like it.
translation.ko: 그래도 다시 얼음판에 오니 좋네 그래, 여기만 한 게 없지

translation.en: I need you in the stands. Yeah, I want training recorded.
So, Mac's been training hard, haven't you, Mac?
-Yeah. -[Anton] This boy's a special player, huh?
I know talent when I see it.
Uh, she's fine. She's just had a bit of a day.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 오늘 좀 힘든 일이 있었어

translation.en: Now, that's a Kayla storm-off if I've ever seen one.
translation.ko: 그게 케일라 스타일이지 화나서 나가는 거

translation.en: That's typical. First training session with Hammarström,
you gotta make it all about you? Can't you just let me have my thing?
translation.ko: 네 생각만 해야겠어? 나한테 집중 좀 해주면 안 돼?

translation.en: You… Your thing? So it's not enough for you to steal my life in Canada.
translation.ko: 집중? 나한테 캐나다를 뺏은 걸로 모자라서

translation.en: -Now you wanna take skating from me too? -Oh, my G--
-Get over yourself, Kayla. -Me and Jacob had something.
translation.ko: - 잘난 척 그만해, 케일라 - 나랑 제이컵은 가능성 있었어

translation.en: No, you and Jacob had a hobby.
translation.ko: 아니, 너랑 제이컵은 취미 활동 한 거야

translation.en: I don't know if you've noticed, but I'm going for the literal NHL here.
translation.ko: 아는지 모르겠지만 난 여기서 NHL로 갈 거야

translation.en: If it was that important, Mom and Dad would've found a way for you to stay.
translation.ko: 너희가 잘했다면 엄마 아빠가 캐나다에 남을 방법을 찾아줬겠지

translation.en: ♪ You are good and you are pure The angel knockin' at my door ♪
-We just need to make sure that she's-- -Kayla.
You can't be a success without discipline, without dedication.
translation.ko: 규율과 헌신 없이는 성공할 수 없다

translation.en: Silly girl. She's gonna get herself hurt.
Pull a stunt like that again, and you're banned from my rink, okay?
translation.ko: 그딴 짓 한 번만 더하면 이 링크에 못 들어온다, 알겠나?

translation.en: Mac, get changed. We're going home. And you, Kayla. Come on. Let's go.
translation.ko: 맥, 옷 갈아입어, 집에 가자 케일라, 너도, 어서!

translation.en: [Luke] What the hell were you thinking?
-Um, have you seen hockey? -[mom] Don't be smart.
translation.ko: - 하키 자체가 거친데요? - 똑똑한 척하지 마

translation.en: Never in anger, and never, ever against your sister.
translation.ko: 절대 화내면 안 돼 특히, 케일라한테는 절대로

translation.en: And as for you, we are so disappointed in you, Kayla.
That is not how we brought you up to behave.
-Humiliating your brother like that. -In front of his whole team.
translation.ko: - 맥을 그렇게 망신 주고 - 그것도 팀 전체가 보는데

translation.en: It's not how we do things in our family.
No, I know exactly how we do things in our family.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 우리 가족이 어떤지는 잘 알아요

translation.en: We turn our whole world upside down, give up everything
so one person can play a stupid sport.
translation.ko: 바보 같은 운동선수 한 명을 밀어주죠

translation.en: Right. Well, I better start making some dinner, then.
Dad was gonna make three-bean stew,
but after the day we've had, no need to inflict that on anyone.
It's not me you need to be saying sorry to, is it?
Today is all you need to be apologizing for, okay?
'Cause everything else we decided as a family.
translation.ko: 다른 건 가족이 같이 결정한 거니까

translation.en: Oh, but not like in the Chinooks.
All that warm air coming in over the mountain.
translation.ko: 산을 넘어 불어오는 그 따스한 바람

translation.en: English wind is just, uh, windy.
I'm sorry you miss stuff too.
And you know what I don't miss?
And your brother and your mom.
'Cause Canada might be where we're from, but home, that's wherever we're together.
translation.ko: 캐나다는 고향이지만 집은 우리가 함께하는 곳이야

translation.en: So, if I had a crazy dream, you'd make it work for me too?
Well, maybe not for that, uh, that skater your mom found.
There's something you need to know.
Please, please. Just, you felt it too.
That connection. I know you did.
translation.ko: 맘이 통하는 기분 말이야 그랬던 거 알아

translation.en: I'm guessing that helmet's not for show.
So if it's a secret, I'll keep it, but please just tell me who you are.
translation.ko: 비밀이라면, 지킬게 네가 누군지만 얘기해 줘
